description:
Yggdrasill is the leader of http://anidb.net/ch17803 [Cruxis] and the http://anidb.net/ch17802 [Desians]. He is the one who orchestrated the journey of regeneration in order to find a vessel for his sister Martel who died during the Ancient Kharlan War.
He is also one of the Four Seraphim of Cruxis, together with http://anidb.net/ch11682 [Kratos Aurion], http://anidb.net/ch11714 [Yuan Ka-Fai] and his sister.
name: Yggdrasill
